events.title: Events
events.description:
Do you want to improve your French, English or Japanese?
Join our next event!

explanation.title: How does the event work?
explanation.1:
1. We'll find you a seat
at a table of 6 to 8 people.
explanation.2:
2. French, English or Japanese,
you'll speak in one language for
15 mins.
explanation.3:
3. After 15 mins, we switch language.
The conversation continues!
explanation.4:
4. Improve your language skills
with a range of conversation partners!

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who are we?
about.description:
Gengoffee is a Franco-Japanese group based in Paris, bringing together a multicultural and multilinguistic community during our events.

We organise French-Japanese and French-English language exchanges in a friendly and supportive environment. Our events are hosted in cafés and bars allowing us to relax and chat over a drink!

We host multiple events every month and welcome all levels of fluency.
about.followus: You can also contact us on social media!

1.title: Events
1.description: The total number of events organised since our creation! That's over 6000 sign-ups and counting!

2.title: Community
2.description: A total of more than 6000 members across our different groups! Don't forget to join our networks Meetup and Instagram!

3.title: Collaborators
3.description: The group is currently organised by 11 active collaborators. Not to mention our external partners!
